articles.title: Amazon's India Business Chief On Why He Pulled The Plug On IPL - NDTV
articles.description: Manish Tiwary had only been in his new job as head of Amazon.com Inc.'s India business a couple of months when he faced a weighty decision: How aggressively should the US e-commerce giant bid for media rights to the Indian Premier League?
articles.content:

articles.title: Relief to consumers: Branded edible oil makers slash prices by up to Rs 15 a litre - Economic Times
articles.description: The drop in prices has prompted distributors to stock up as demand is expected to pick up. The fall in edible oil prices will also have an impact on food inflation, a major part of which comes from edible oils. The edible oil and fat category saw 13.26% infla…
